name: path-pattern
description: A url matching lib to go with Realytics/react-router-magic
author: Etienne Dldc <etienne.dldc@outlook.fr>

scripts.build: NODE_ENV=production npm run clean && NODE_ENV=production webpack lib/index.js
scripts.build-stats: NODE_ENV=production npm run clean && NODE_ENV=production webpack lib/index.js --json > stats.json
